channel.title: Changing how client reads background images
channel.description:
I'm pretty inexperienced with anything client side, so I figured I'd ask my question here :)
Basically, I've noticed that some clients need a background image with one side mirroring the other while some just use a traditional picture, and I was interested in what you alter in the client to change whether it needs a mirrored image or not. Or just how you would take a regular picture and make it into a mirrored one.
